event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Use 'fmadm faulty' to identify the device and then update the firmware to the latest version. Contact Sun support for further information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A firmware version mismatch was detected for a PCI device.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item: A firmware version mismatch was detected for a PCI device. Use 'fmadm faulty' to identify the device and use 'fwflash' to update the firmware to the latest version. Contact Sun support for further information.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: Degraded services provided by the device instances associated with this fault.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: One or more device instances may be disabled.
event_registry_properties.name: title
